LanguageData.GoTable.label: 바둑판
LanguageData.GoTable.description: Go is one of the oldest strategy games, and one of the simplest to build.
LanguageData.GoTable_Blueprint.label: go 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.GoTable_Blueprint_Install.label: go 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.GoTable_Frame.label: 바둑판 (건설 중)
LanguageData.GoTable_Frame.description: Go is one of the oldest strategy games, and one of the simplest to build.
LanguageData.ReversiTable.label: 리버시 테이블
LanguageData.ReversiTable.description: A simple strategy game that involves placing rocks on both sides of your opponent's pieces, and then switching that piece to your color.
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Blueprint.label: 리버시 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Blueprint_Install.label: 리버시 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Frame.label: 리버시 테이블 (건설 중)
LanguageData.ReversiTable_Frame.description: A simple strategy game that involves placing rocks on both sides of your opponent's pieces, and then switching that piece to your color.
LanguageData.CardTable.label: 카드 테이블
LanguageData.CardTable.description: A 카드 테이블 specially made for playing a wide variety of card games. Suitable for 1-4 players.
LanguageData.CardTable_Blueprint.label: 카드 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.CardTable_Blueprint_Install.label: 카드 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.CardTable_Frame.label: 카드 테이블 (건설 중)
LanguageData.CardTable_Frame.description: A 테이블 specially made for playing a wide variety of card games. Suitable for 1-4 players.
LanguageData.RimColony.label: 림콜로니
LanguageData.RimColony.description: RimColony is a game about 건설 중 and sustaining a colony after crash landing on a rim world. Some roaming 상인 had a twisted sense of humor bringing this along.
LanguageData.RimColony_Blueprint_Install.label: 림콜로니 (청사진)
LanguageData.ReadingTable.label: 독서 테이블
LanguageData.ReadingTable.description: A small 테이블 made to be the perfect height for reading. Has a small drawer for holding books.
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Blueprint.label: 독서 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Blueprint_Install.label: 독서 테이블 (청사진)
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Frame.label: 독서 테이블 (건설 중)
LanguageData.ReadingTable_Frame.description: A small 테이블 made to be the perfect height for reading. Has a small drawer for holding books.
LanguageData.Painting.label: 그림
LanguageData.Painting.description: A painting. Useful for covering up holes, and quite easy on the eyes.
LanguageData.Painting_Blueprint_Install.label: 그림 (청사진)
LanguageData.Easel.label: 그림 판대
LanguageData.Easel.description: An 판대 equipped for artistic painting.
LanguageData.Easel_Blueprint.label: 그림 판대 (청사진)
LanguageData.Easel_Blueprint_Install.label: 그림 판대 (청사진)
LanguageData.Easel_Frame.label: 그림 판대 (건설 중)
LanguageData.Easel_Frame.description: An 판대 equipped for artistic painting.
LanguageData.ArcadeRS.label: 게임기 : Rum Swirled
LanguageData.ArcadeRS.description: A game about sailors shipwrecked on an island with plenty of rum, but no shelter.
LanguageData.ArcadeRS_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Rum Swirled (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeMC.label: 게임기 : MintCraft
LanguageData.ArcadeMC.description: A game where the entire world can be shaped by the player, who crafts many things out of mint leaves. Don't ask how.
LanguageData.ArcadeMC_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : MintCraft (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeHL.label: 게임기 : Halva Life
LanguageData.ArcadeHL.description: In Halva Life the player plays as Gordon, the red hot pastry chef who must reign in his kitchen before it becomes a total nightmare.
LanguageData.ArcadeHL_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Halva Life (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeES.label: 게임기 : Elder Scones
LanguageData.ArcadeES.description: "It's just you, a butter knife, and a plate full of week old scones that you must defend from ravenous townspeople..." Was what the box read for this game.
LanguageData.ArcadeES_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Elder Scones (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeBG.label: 게임기 : Baguettris
LanguageData.ArcadeBG.description: Oh noA baguette supply ship didn't close it's hatch correctlyQuickly stack the falling baguettes for loading on to another ship
LanguageData.ArcadeBG_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Baguettris (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeCB.label: 게임기 : Cooking Baba
LanguageData.ArcadeCB.description: Join Hakase Baba in the kitchen as he teaches you legendary cooking techniques. Then play challenge mode and compete for the title of "Best Chef" in the 시스템
LanguageData.ArcadeCB_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Cooking Baba (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadePS.label: 게임기 : Plants Vs. Salamis
LanguageData.ArcadePS.description: A Salami mothership aproaches on an intercept vector; they mean to board youArmed only with genetically modified super plants, you must grow your defenses and keep the ships cargo safe
LanguageData.ArcadePS_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Plants Vs. Salamis (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadePK.label: 게임기 : Psycho Knots
LanguageData.ArcadePK.description: The artisanal pizzeria championships are back for their 72nd tournament, can you out-제빵 : your way to the top?
LanguageData.ArcadePK_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Psycho Knots (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeSP.label: 게임기 : Speltunky
LanguageData.ArcadeSP.description: One day a sinkhole collapses in the middle of your dinkel wheat farm, sending you plummeting into a massive underground cave network. Your only hope for escape is to mine your way out, but danger lurks around every corner.
LanguageData.ArcadeSP_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Speltunky (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeTZ.label: 게임기 : The Zimz
LanguageData.ArcadeTZ.description: In The Zimz, you play a game that simulates people and you watch as they sometimes play games that simulate people. Talk about a multiverse...
LanguageData.ArcadeTZ_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : The Zimz (청사진)
LanguageData.ArcadeTV.label: 게임기 : Trauma Vendor
LanguageData.ArcadeTV.description: It's 14:00, time to drive the truck around and see who needs medical treatment. Just another day on a warring urbworld.
LanguageData.ArcadeTV_Blueprint_Install.label: 게임기 : Trauma Vendor (청사진)
